item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal and professional webpage. I am a personal and professional person. I am currently teaching American literature at Vilnius University. I am always working on improving my classes, my research, and my personal brand. I have recently finished a dissertation on literatureâ€™s intersection with geographic knowledge-production in nineteenth-century America. It features chapters on Charles Brockden Brown, Margaret Fuller, and Emily Dickinson. I used to take photographs. I am interested in being better at computers.

item.title: localauthor
item.description: Occasional short sketches on local fare and otherwise, offered freely.

item.title: poem-machine
item.description: Turning your favorite source text into the stock of your creations one random word at a time.

item.title: poem-machine-crawl
item.description: Gaze on the infinite crawl of poetry generated by the poem-machine, drawing on some classic (public-domain) texts. Currently Serving Up: Dickinson’s Poems (1890) Thoreau’s Walden Fuller’s Summer on the Lakes (1844) Or, visit the Github repository, to see the source code: https://github.com/localauthor/poem-machine-crawl
